_description: Cross-venue arbitrage for 15-minute crypto prediction markets. Exploits pricing differences between Kalshi and Polymarket on the same underlying 15m binary contract.
_usage: Requires accounts on both Kalshi and Polymarket. The arbitrage signal payload contains venue-native market IDs for both legs. Update market_mappings if signal market IDs differ from venue-native IDs.
_market_id_notes: Arbitrage signals include leg_buy.market_id and leg_sell.market_id with venue-native IDs. The market_mappings below are examples - real arb signals typically carry native IDs directly.
